website_summaries.verdict: Another top-quality choice for individuals seeking a fruit picker with twist technology and padded claws.
pros: Soft, padded rubber claws allow for a firm and gentle grip when picking
Padded prongs allow for safe and simple twisting to harvest
Aluminum handle comes with a built-in safety lock
cons: Expensive when compared to similar products

customer_reviews.title: Piece of crap.. 💩
customer_reviews.text: This is a piece of crap. Ordered the 6-foot and received a used one. There was dirt and dust on the underside of the claw, no tags (red flag), and it was missing one of the rubber grips. Also when testing the grip mechanism, it doesn’t even work! The claw was meant to open and close when you squeeze the handle mechanism but when I did that, nothing happens! Terrible seller, horrible defective product. It’s going back!
customer_reviews.author: Fairy Panda

customer_reviews.title: Worth the cost, easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Since the fruit picker was purchased, I now get the papaya before the birds do. Couple of tips on using it. Watch the YouTube videos. I found them instructive on getting the right technique. We have giant papaya. The picker works on them without damaging the fruit. Because of the extension required to pick the papaya, having a second person on the receiving end is helpful. The papaya are very heavy when they are so large. There are predrilled holes in the extension arm. They lock in. You must lock in to operate the squeeze grip. Overall, this has been well worth the money and I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Karen L.

customer_reviews.title: Best citrus picker ever!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tool! We can reach the very top of our grapefruit, lemon and orange trees easily with this. It doesn't hang up like basket type pickers do. You can easily select a specific fruit, grab it securely, and pull it off. Best picker we've ever used or seen. Well built! Should last a long time. A little more expensive than some of the others, but it just works much better and is better built.
customer_reviews.author: D. White

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Papaya Picker
customer_reviews.text: Works great! I used the basket type fruit picker for large papayas and it didn’t work as well as this fruit picker. Awesome fruit picker, grips very well.
customer_reviews.author: Clay

customer_reviews.title: Grapefruit picker!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to pick grapefruit from our trees. At the end of the season it is sometimes hard to reach the fruit through the twigs high in the tree but with the Zenport it's as easy as pie. I also debated weather or not to get the smaller one. You definitely want to buy the longer one to get the fruit high in the tree. Don't hesitate on this purchase. I've told three of my neighbors.
customer_reviews.author: Jason F. Valencia

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy pole & strong gripper. Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my spouse & it was much better than expected. Very strong & sturdy even when fully extended. Strong gripper too. Will likely buy another for myself so we can both participate in safely picking up crabs & picking fruit from our trees.
customer_reviews.author: Coos River Family

customer_reviews.title: Good grabber.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to retrieve items that go over the back of my deck--the drop is about the reach of this grabber. I am really please with the strength of it. If there are weeds in the way of the bean bag or ball or napkin I'm trying to rescue, it just rips them out as I go. I didn't see any reviews of this for non-fruit purposes, but it's great for mine.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. Dalloway

customer_reviews.title: Picker needs bigger claws to capture the top of the fruit.
customer_reviews.text: Product design is good. It works but it can be improved by extending the claws that hold the papaya so that it grabs the fruit from the top instead of the middle. Problem is when holding in the middle it will puncture the fruit When pressured to hold tight. If not enough pressure is applied than it slips over the fruit and cannot twist the fruit to break it.
customer_reviews.author: Mohiuddin Syed

customer_reviews.title: Tree top picker great
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I have a grapefruit tree that I can’t reach the top of the fruit so it usually dies but now I can get it out one by one great product
customer_reviews.author: Michelle riley

customer_reviews.title: This this is a bit expensive but it's pretty good, it extends pretty far and is good ...
customer_reviews.text: This this is a bit expensive but it's pretty good, it extends pretty far and is good quality and build ... I'm not sure how I'd improve it, I just thought it would be a bit easier to use, as i got it to get limes .. any smaller fruit will take some twisting to break it off from it's stem. and the squeeze handle isn't great to squeeze & twist with... So it's great, but not sure how to make it even better.. I'm overall quite satisfied....
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: Best orange picker I've used.
customer_reviews.text: For our Washington Navel oranges and our lemons, this is by far the best picker I've ever had. I worry a little about how robust it will turn out to be, but it works great. I don't have to use the ladder nearly as much now.
customer_reviews.author: B. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Precise way to grab each hard to reach orange
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality! The only tool that works with such a precise way to grab the fruit. Minimal twisting or pulling commonly used for those typical basket style models. Used it on my orange tree for those way at the top or deep within the tree itself.
customer_reviews.author: BluSky500

customer_reviews.title: Good grip
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Easy to use. Great for full size oranges and apples.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny
customer_reviews.text: I love my fruit picker! I can get lemons that I have not been able to reach ever before. Yes, was more expensive than the one with the fruit basket attached, but my coworker has one of those and it leaves puncture holes the fruit. This does not. Worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: LT

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work.
customer_reviews.text: Unfortunately, this doesn't work. The mechanism used to grasp the fruit is very weak. It doesn't keep a grasp when you pull away from the fruit. The grasping mechanism is also inconsistent on whether it contracts into a grasp at all (i.e., when pressing on the handle, it doesn't always grasp).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEST PICKER EVER! 😃
customer_reviews.text: Awesome fruit picker!!! Only thing we would change is wish the head was a little stronger (it's made of plastic) if it were made of metal like the rest of the picker it would be better. We have a huge orange tree and we got most of the oranges off in no time! We also have a grapefruit tree that we could not reach them unless we got on a ladder. With this picker no more ladder! Now the father in law wants one too!
customer_reviews.author: L.S.

customer_reviews.title: I have NO REGRETS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This tool does a great job helping me to pick limes from my Mexican lime tree.
customer_reviews.author: The Desert Rose

customer_reviews.title: very well built
customer_reviews.text: It is well built, and function very well. I bought it for fruit pick up and the only problem I have with it is after you pick up the fruit unless you have a container next to you you can’t reach and open it at the same time. Overall I am glad I bought it and will have plenty of use for it.
customer_reviews.author: nabil

customer_reviews.title: Great for Papaya
customer_reviews.text: This thing is the best picker I have found for picking papayas. It works great and is well made. It has three adjustable lengths and reaches quite far. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Hellkell

customer_reviews.title: Slick
customer_reviews.text: Keeps the apples from bruising and makes it easier to not drop them
customer_reviews.author: J Edstrom

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Fruit picker has multiple uses!
customer_reviews.text: Great tool for my growing lime tree! Very easy to use and it works well. But the best part is I can use this instrument for other needs! My grandson threw a beach ball inside the house and it hit the chandelier knocking the shades to a tilted crooked position, I was able to grasp the small shades and put them in the proper position without getting out the tall ladder!
customer_reviews.author: NanNan

customer_reviews.title: good gift
customer_reviews.text: I don't know if I'd want to use this thing to harvest anything on a large scale, but it's perfect for extending your reach on hand picking. Got it for my parents to use in their retirement community. Seems like all the good ones are just out of reach. Definitely lengthens your harvest in such a setting. :)
customer_reviews.author: Carl B.

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but it does exactly what I need ...
customer_reviews.text: A bit pricey but it does exactly what I need it to do: adjust lengths, and snatch fruit out of people's trees :) My only regret is that it is (depending on the fruit) to small for grapefruit and pommelos and too small for apricots, cherries, etc... Really a Lemon/orange/ apple kind of picker.
customer_reviews.author: nadine periat

customer_reviews.title: Best too
customer_reviews.text: I love this tool. I keep throwing the dog balls over the fence and i use this to retrieve them
customer_reviews.author: Mojgan Toofan

customer_reviews.title: This works great on small to large fruit Extra large it will ...
customer_reviews.text: You reach for the fruit, squeeze, lock it, and twist. This works great on small to large fruit Extra large it will not lock but if you hang on to the trigger it still works. If you cannot lock it because the fruit is too large you have to keep squeezing till you want to release the fruit. It fits through the branches to reach the fruit and does not get caught. I would easily tell someone yes buy one.
customer_reviews.author: Eva

customer_reviews.title: They love it and said it works very well
customer_reviews.text: Got this as a gift for my parents that have grapefruit, lime, lemon, and orange trees. They love it and said it works very well.
customer_reviews.author: mike altschuld

customer_reviews.title: Better than basket style
customer_reviews.text: Good quality. The "twist" off method of fruit removal is perfect.
customer_reviews.author: doobee

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased it for my cousin who has a grapefruit tree and she loves. Poke can't stop singing its praise! Get it!
customer_reviews.author: Katy man

customer_reviews.title: This is the first tool i've used to pick papayas ...
customer_reviews.text: This is the first tool i've used to pick papayas with that really works! They don't drop out of it, so you can get them to the ground safely, with no bruises. Really worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: rebecca moore

customer_reviews.title: great trash picker
customer_reviews.text: I use this to pick trash out of roadside ditch. It works great. If i get any pears I will try it on them too!
customer_reviews.author: rcamano

customer_reviews.title: great design made of cheap materials
customer_reviews.text: This is a great design but they chose to make it out of very cheap material. Handle broke second time I using it while I was grabbing an orange. Handle looks to be made out of plastic or a really cheap aluminum. Really wanted to like this picker. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Alvidrez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: A well-designed, well-made tool. Easy to use. Can't find anything to complain about.
customer_reviews.author: C & J

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Much better than the "basket" type pickers, excellent grasp & pole extension. Picked 800+ apples worked like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: PZ Account

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worth the extra cost for a quality product like this
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great precision tool it works as described
customer_reviews.text: very good picker does not damage the tree you can be very precise it just takes patience. I use it primarily for citrus. I can see someone in a rush may not like this tool but if you have a helper to catch the fruit you can go faster. the basket type with bent tines work faster but you can break branches this one is slow but precise. I like the tool 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kzziggy1

customer_reviews.title: Great design!
customer_reviews.text: Great design and it does the trick. However when fully extended, it feels flimsy. Some parts are plastic and may not last. But if it breaks, I'll buy another one!
customer_reviews.author: Carly's Mom

customer_reviews.title: As good as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: It doesn't hold up well doing twisting motions, but it's great for straight in-and-out motion. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Bill Mansfield

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It was dirty and broken package, but product itself is excellent.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Does a good job at picking high hanging fruit. Glad I purchased it for my pal who has orange, lemon and persimmon trees.
customer_reviews.author: deb riffin

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to extend, good gripping tips. Works perfect for our use.
customer_reviews.author: PMT

customer_reviews.title: Junk-BUYER BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely one of the worst products I've ever bought. Saw the good reviews and went for it against my instincts. I have a small orchard of fruit trees and had the plain basket picker which worked brilliantly. I thought this would be kinder to the trees. As soon as you pull the grip around fruit, it opens up without grabbing anything. Not much I can do since I didn't have time to open it as soon as it was delivered and now past the return window. Save yourself some money. DO NOT BUY. Maybe I have a defective one but there is no phone number on it to call and see if I can trouble shoot. Poo to Zenport
customer_reviews.author: KimOCmom

customer_reviews.title: Really bummed when I opened the package, and the ...
customer_reviews.text: Really bummed when I opened the package, and the "retractor" claw didn't move when I clicked the handle. Especially irritating because repackaging/reshipping the return is a pain in the butt b/c of its size.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie Borneman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: The best gadget I have found to easily pick fruit on my tall grapefruit tree!
customer_reviews.author: RGarcia

customer_reviews.title: Started working great. Thought i found my answer to picking my ...
customer_reviews.text: Started working great. Thought i found my answer to picking my fruit,,....but,,,,after. About 15 minutes of use the...thing stopped working !!! The fingers would not close to pick fruit....so now ii have a $90.00 extendable stick of $10.00 aluminum....going to c ontact mfg...let ya know....for now do not buy. Not worth your time..,..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The Zenport Fruit Tree Harvester is Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: We have orange trees in our backyard and needed a reliable alternative to going up and down a ladder to pick the fruit. The Zenport Harvester and Picker is ideal for our needs. It works well, is easy to operate and was a great price. Would recommend this item to anyone with fruit trees.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Good, but...
customer_reviews.text: The picker worked well weaving through the orange tree brances to pick the fruit. However, during the first use, one of the foam rubber fingers fell off. Wrote to the company about it, but have not heard back in 2 weeks.
customer_reviews.author: s naguwa

product_meta.title: Zenport ZL6146A Long Reach Telescopic Fruit Harvester and Picker, 6-Feet Extension
product_meta.description: Size:6-feetThe Zenport ZL6146A professional telescopic fruit picker features a soft TPR grip aluminum handle with a safety lock and a pole that extends up to 6-feet allowing you to easily reach and pick fruit. The three bruise free, soft rubber padded claws safely hold and protect fruit from damage as you twist it off and pick with the harvester. The fruit picker will allow you to harvest many crops without having to climb a ladder. Features a 3-position telescopic pole which extends from 44-Inches, 56-Inches, up to 72-Inches fully extended.
feature_bullets: ZL6146A long reach telescopic fruit picker that safely holds fruit as you twist it when harvesting fruit tree field crops
Extends from 44-Inch, 56-Inch and to 72-Inch fully extended
Heavy duty telescopic aluminum pole construction
Three bruise free soft rubber padded claws keep each piece of fruit safe from damage when picking
Soft TPR grip aluminum handle with safety lock

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping. Learn More
specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars80 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
